title: Fishing Heartbeat Fisherman Live to Fish Funny Men's Graphic Short Sleeve Tee
features: FISHING HEARTBEAT | Do you know an outdoorsman who lives to fish? Here is a lightweight and comfortable graphic short sleeve tee for any fisherman to wear whether they are casting away off a pier or on their boat or just walking around town thinking about their next trip to the lake.

PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY FISHERMAN | Grab this joke tee for your dad, grandpa, uncle, brother or friend who is convinced that they are a great outdoorsman. Whether it's for Father's Day, Christmas, Birthday or just because, this is a great gift for the guy chasing a big catch.

DESIGNED & DECORATED IN OHIO | This design was drawn and illustrated by a member of the B-Wear Art Team in Zanesville, Ohio. From there, the art was taken to the other side of B-Wear's facility to the state-of-the-art screen print facility where it was decorated by our expert screen print team.
UNISEX SIZING | Wondering what size to get? No worries, our overwhelming feedback is that our garments run true to size so you can grab the same size you typically get in unisex of men's sizing.

PREMIUM COMFORT | Lightweight premium crew neck classic fit short sleeve tee with a screen print graphic - It is incredibly soft and provides premium comfort with an 50% polyester, 50% ringspun cotton blend and is preshrunk so you don't have to worry about it shrinking up in the wash
description: Lightweight Premium Short Sleeve Tee with Distressed Screen Print Graphic Crew Neck, Short Sleeve, Classic Fit 50% Ringspun Cotton / 50% Polyester Screen Printed In The USA
